full_summary:
================================
## ***ADSAR: All Domain Space Agile Radars Contract Notice***

### ***Publication Information***

* **Reference Number**: WS4363458444-Doc4363501142
* **Publication Date**: December 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 11, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

### ***Contract Overview***

The proposed contract is for a three-year period, from the date of award to January 30, 2027, with two one-year options to extend the contract period. The contract seeks to provide application or technology research and development services for Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC).

### ***Contracting Entity and End User***

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* **End User**: Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC)
	+ Address: 400 Cumberland Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1N 1J8

### ***Trade Agreements and Regions***

* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions**: National Capital Region (NCR)

### ***Contact Information***

* **Name**: Melissa Hall, SPAC/PSPC
* **Email**: melissa.hall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: Not provided
* **Fax**: Not provided

### ***Notice URL and Tender Description***

* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18334731
* **Tender Description**: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 11, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST.

### ***Contract Category and UNSPSC***

* **Contract Category**: SRV
* **UNSPSC**: 81141902 - Application or technology research and development service

### ***Tender Status***

* **Tender Status**: Expired (Note: As this contract has already expired, it is not accepting new bids). 

### ***Important Note***

Please note that this contract has already expired, and the tender closing date has passed. Any new bids will not be accepted.
